author: hillion
msg: - fixed a bug in the path parser (.1.2 was not correctly splitted),
- changed the SAX parser configuration to handle namespaces,
- the DTD lookup is now based on public Ids.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Modifications to how TextLayout is done to improve performance.
getBounds (which includes text layout) on a text heavy document
was ~50 percent of total transcode time, this is now ~13%.
This has gone through extensive testing with our regression tools, however
with such a large change in such complex code the introduction of a bug
or two can't be ruled out.

author: vhardy
msg: + Use new splash image on front page
+ Updated SVGGraphics2D doc with Paul's contrib documentation.
